comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: They parked all those trains at night ?  How long did this test take ?  And how did anyone catch a train anywhere if they were all parked on the Bridge ?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] It could be why they were testing at night, so as not to disrupt too much travel. There was still 9 days to go until the official opening.
